extensionDescription.description: The description of the extension in Chrome (not the big one in the Store).
extensionDescription.message: The best way to learn keyboard shortcuts while you work in Gmail™ by http://www.keyrocket.com.

extensionName.description: The name/title of the extension in Chrome and the Chrome Webstore

gmailSettingsMessage_Done.description: Button text of The message shown for Gmail settings to make the extension show notifications.

gmailSettingsMessage_Not_Now.description: Button text of The message shown for Gmail settings to make the extension show notifications.

gmailSettingsMessage_Part_01.description: The message shown for Gmail settings to make the extension show notifications.
gmailSettingsMessage_Part_01.message: In order for KeyRocket for Gmail™ to work properly please:

gmailSettingsMessage_Part_02_optional_Se.description: Name of the 'Settings' category in Gmail. Shown if hint is not shown on the Settings page Optional Part of The message shown for Gmail settings to make the extension show notifications.

gmailSettingsMessage_Part_02_optional_go.description: Hint to switch to the 'Settings' category in Gmail. Shown if hint is not shown on the Settings page Optional Part of The message shown for Gmail settings to make the extension show notifications.

gmailSettingsMessage_Part_03_optional_Se.description: Hint to change display language to a English. Shown on the Settings page Optional Part of The message shown for Gmail settings to make the extension show notifications.

gmailSettingsMessage_Part_04_Set_Keyboar.description: Hint to set keyboard shortcuts to on. Shown as Part of The message shown for Gmail settings to make the extension show notifications.

gmailSettingsMessage_Part_05_Save_Settin.description: Hint to save settings. Shown as Part of The message shown for Gmail settings to make the extension show notifications.

notificationMiss_Or.description: Linking part between alternative of the Missed Notifaction 'Press x or y to Go to Inbox.

notificationMiss_Press.description: Starting part of the Missed Notifaction 'Press g then i to Go to Inbox.

notificationMiss_Then.description: Linking part between sequences of the Missed Notifaction 'Press g then i to Go to Inbox.
